Uses of Class
database.User

  • Packages that use User 
    Package Description
    database  

    • Uses of User in database

      Methods in database that return User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static User Database.getUser(java.lang.String username)
      To be used if the user has been confirmed to exist in the login stage if they do exist then the username and password is correct this gets all the users details and stores them in an object This method is currently superfluous (while loginCheck does the same thing)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets video info from the database.
      static boolean Database.houseDelete(House houseDetails, User userDetails)
      Deletes the house and all information attributed to that house.

      static boolean Database.userInsert(User userDetails)
      A basic function that take an instance of User.java, and enters it into the database you're connected to.
      static boolean Database.userRegister(User newUser)
      Takes the information required to create a new user checks they don't already exist and enters them into the database.
